desc: CitrusWirx disinfectant surface wipes are easy to use wipes that incorporate Quaternary Ammonia as the active ingredient. Listed as one of the most common and effective disinfectant ingredients, it helps kill most bacteria, viruses, and fungi found on hard surfaces. With fast acting capability, it is perfect for

layout.text: Customer safety is important in all industries from department stores to hardware stores. Our CitrusWirx dispensers allow your customers to wipe their cart handle clean before use - giving them peace of mind while in your store.
